V2 FIXES THE BLACK FRAMING OF THE PICTURE - NO MORE "BLACK BARS"
When using a PC video player (like PotPlayer or VLC), version1 had a black frame around the picture if the player was maximized or full screen. Now with version2 the picture will scale with the player.

Battlestar Galactica: The Series Lowdown was a special television program aired on the Sci-Fi Channel (now SyFy) before the season 2 premiere. Fan mail was answered by the cast who gave various interviews. The first season was summarized for the benefit of potential new viewers and a sneak preview of season 2 was presented. It was released with the Battlestar Galactica Season1 DVDs as an extra and is not included on any of the Blu-Ray sets AFAIK.
